description: Try our easy to follow Breakfast Jacket Potato Platter recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Breakfast Jacket Potato Platter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420 g baked beans in tomato sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Place corn in a microwave-safe bowl and microwave on high for 3 minutes or until tender. Transfer to a small bowl and add onion, mixing to combine. Place on board. Arrange spinach on board. Serve.
